issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* Eucalyptus CreateStack API doesn't support _Parameters_ option as it is in [AWS|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/APIReference/API_CreateStack.html]. * Per AWS CloudFormations API Documentation for CreateStack: {quote} Parameters.member.N A list of Parameter structures that specify input parameters for the stack. Type: Parameter list Required: No {quote} *Signs* Using euca2ools 3.1.0-0.0.202.el6, euform-create-stack has the following description for the _parameters_ option: {quote} -p KEY=VALUE, --parameter KEY=VALUE key and value of the parameters to use with the new stack's template, separated by an "=" character {quote} This is different from [AWS's cfn-create-stack|https://aws.amazon.com/developertools/AWS-CloudFormation/2555753788650372] command. cfn-create-stack supports the following: {quote} -p, --parameters "key1=value1;key2=value2..." Parameter values used to create the stack. {quote} If a user tries to pass to the _parameter_ option a value in the same format as cfn-create-stack to euform-create-stack, the following behavior is witnessed: {code} # euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-example.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-5FF95D61;Acct1User01KeyPair=account1-user01" DockerStack --region account1-user01@ euform-create-stack: error (ValidationError): Parameters: [Acct1User01KeyPair] must have values {code} * Command ran with --debug option: {code} [root@odc-f-13 ~]# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-example.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-5FF95D61;Acct1User01KeyPair=account1-user01" DockerStack --region account1-user01@ --debug 2014-08-01 07:28:23,468 DEBUG CreateStack parsed arguments: {'key_id': None, 'security_token': None, 'TemplateBody': , 'url': None, 'Tags.member': None, 'TimeoutInMinutes': None, 'StackName': 'DockerStack', 'NotificationARNs': None, 'secret_key': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'DisableRollback': False, 'Parameters.member': [{'ParameterValue': 'emi-5FF95D61;Acct1User01KeyPair=account1-user01', 'ParameterKey': 'UbuntuImageId'}], 'TemplateURL': None, 'region': 'account1-user01@'} 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config found default-region = ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config finding region option cloudformation-url 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 DEBUG Config section ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config found ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors::cloudformation-url = 'http://cloudformation.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/' 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config finding region option name 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 DEBUG Config section ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors 2014-08-01 07:28:23,469 INFO Config found ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors::name = 'ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors' 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 INFO Config finding region option verify-ssl 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 DEBUG Config section ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 DEBUG Config section * 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 INFO Config novalue for verify-ssl 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 INFO Config finding user option key-id 2014-08-01 07:28:23,470 DEBUG Config section account1-user01 '2010-05-15', 'Parameters.member.1.ParameterKey': 'UbuntuImageId', 'TemplateBody': '{\n "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",\n\n "Description" : "Cloudformation Example: Run instance with userdata in security group",\n\n "Parameters": {\n "UbuntuImageId": {\n "Description":"Ubuntu Image id",\n "Type":"String",\n "NoEcho":"True"\n },\n "Acct1User01KeyPair": {\n "Description":"Account1 User01 Key Pair",\n "Type":"String",\n "NoEcho":"True"\n }\n },\n\n "Resources" : {\n "DockerSecurityGroup": {\n "Type": "AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup",\n "Properties": {\n "GroupDescription" : "Security Group with Ingress Rule for DockerInstance",\n "SecurityGroupIngress" : [\n {\n "IpProtocol" : "tcp",\n "FromPort" : "22",\n "ToPort" : "22",\n "CidrIp" : "0.0.0.0/0"\n }\n ]\n }\n },\n\n "DockerInstance": {\n "Type": "AWS::EC2::Instance",\n "Properties": {\n "ImageId" : { "Ref":"UbuntuImageId" },\n "InstanceType" : "m2.xlarge",\n "UserData" : { "Fn::Base64" : "#include https://get.docker.io" },\n "SecurityGroups" : [ \n { "Ref" : "DockerSecurityGroup" } \n ],\n "KeyName" : { "Ref" : "Acct1User01KeyPair" }\n }\n }\n },\n\n "Outputs" : {\n "InstanceId" : {\n "PublicIp" ] }\n }\n }\n}\n\n', 'DisableRollback': 'false', 'Action': 'CreateStack', 'Parameters.member.1.ParameterValue': 'emi-5FF95D61;Acct1User01KeyPair=account1-user01'} 2014-08-01 07:28:23,474 fields.summary: Parameters option isn't accepted by CreateStack
fields.environment:
* single cluster, non-HA
* 1 x CLC, DNS, Cloudformation
* 1 x UFS
* 1 x UFS, Walrus
* 1 x CC, SC (Overlay)
* 2 x NC

comments.body: [~hspencer], not sure why it would be a service issue if euca2ools options differ from AWS tools (I assume this works as expected if you pass multiple "-p"/"--parameter" options to "euform-create-stack")
